examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local win = SWE.DisplayInit("Lua SWE", 640, 480)

SWE.CursorHide()
local txcur = SWE.Texture.Image("arrow.png")
SWE.CursorLoad(txcur)

....

local result = SWE.MainLoop(win)

title: SWE.DisplayDirty
name: DisplayDirty
description: sometimes itâ€™s necessary to tell the display scene update

examples.content:

print(win.width,win.height)

examples.content:

print("display size:", w, h, fullscreen)

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local str = "{\"hello\": 123,\"world\":[1,2,3,4,5]}"
local json = SWE.JsonParse(str)

.... dump json
| "hello" | number:123 |
| "world" | table      |

Parameter.description: only this window will be checked for a visible

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local win = SWE.DisplayInit("Lua SWE", 640, 480)
win.SetResult(123)

......
win.KeyPressEvent = function(k)
    if k == SWE.Key.ESCAPE then
        win:SetVisible(false)
    end
    return true
end
......

print(SWE.MainLoop(win))

type: push custom event to window object
title: SWE.PushEvent
name: PushEvent

Parameter.description: if nil to broadcast event, otherwise unicast to window

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local win = SWE.DisplayInit("Lua SWE", 640, 480)
    local win2 = SWE.Window(50, 50, 200, 100)

    ......
    win.KeyPressEvent = function(k)
        if k == SWE.Key.ESCAPE then
            win:SetVisible(false)
	    return true
	elseif k == SWE.Key.RETURN then
	    SWE.PushEvent(3333, nil, win2)
	    return true
        end
        return false
    end

    win1.SystemUserEvent = function(c,d)
	if c == 3333 then
	    print("SUCCESS")
	end
    end
    ......

    SWE.MainLoop(win)

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local dirname,basename = SWE.SystemDirnameBasename("/var/tmp/screenshot.png")
print(dirname,basename)

... console
"var/tmp"    "screenshot.png"

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local stat = SWE.SystemFileStat("/var/tmp/screenshot.png")

.... dump stat
| mode  | 33204      | 
| gid   | 1000       | 
| uid   | 1000       | 
| nlink | 1          | 
| size  | 404930     | 
| atime | 1565677681 | 
| mtime | 1565677681 | 
| ctime | 1565677681 | 
| isdir | false      |

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local names = SWE.SystemReadDirectory("/var/tmp")

.... dump names
| "/var/tmp/world.log" | "file"      |
| "/var/tmp/hello.log" | "file"      |
| "/var/tmp/mc-root"   | "directory" |

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local buf = SWE.BinaryBuf("0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")
local zip = buf:ZlibCompress()
local base64 = zip:Base64Encode()
print(base64)

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content: | size    | number  | binarybuf length

examples.title: usage variant1
examples.content:
local buf = SWE.BinaryBuf()
buf:ReadFromFile("/var/tmp/test.bin")
if buf ~= nil then
    print(buf:ToJson())
end

examples.title: usage variant2
examples.content:
local file = "/var/tmp/2gis.log"
local buf = SWE.BinaryBuf.ReadFromFile(file)
if buf ~= nil then
    print(buf:ToJson())
end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local frs = SWE.FontRender("dejavusans.ttf", 14)
print(frs.font,frs.size)

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content:
| font    | string  |
| size    | number  |
| blended | boolean |
| style   | number  |
| hinting | number  |

| fixedWidth | number | for fixed font return SymbolAdvance(0x20)
| lineHeight | number | skip line height

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local frs = SWE.FontRender.System()
print(frs.font,frs.size)

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content:
| font    | string  | system |

| fixedWidth | number | for fixed font return SymbolAdvance(0x20)
| lineHeight | number | skip line height

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local net = SWE.NetStream()
local res = net:Connect("127.0.0.1", 22)
if res then
    local info = net:RecvString(0x0A)
    net:SendString("quit\r\n")
    print(info)
else
    print("connect false")
end

.... may be output
.... SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_5.3

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content:
| address | string  |
| port    | number  |

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
-- echo service
    local net = SWE.NetStream()
    local res = net:Listen(2121)
    if res then
	local client = net:WaitAccept()
	if client ~= nil then
    	    client:SendString("echo service\r\n")
    	    local echo = client:RecvString(0x0A)
    	    client:SendString(echo)
	end
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local net = SWE.NetStream()
local res = net:Listen(22222)
if res then
    local client = net:WaitAccept()
    if client ~= nil then
        client:SendString("hello world!\r\n")
    end
else
    print("listen false")
end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local net = SWE.NetStream()
    -- connect to www.com
    local res = net:Connect("69.172.201.208", 80)
    if res then
	local request = "GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nAccept: *" .. "/" .. "*\r\n\r\n"
	net:SendString(request)
	if net:WaitString("<html xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\">\r\n") then
    	    local html = net:RecvString()
    	    print(html)
	end
    else
	print("error: res false")
    end

print(pt.posx,pt.posy)

local pt = SWE.Point(10, 20)
print(pt:ToJson())
.....
'{"posx":10,"posy":20}'

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local pt = SWE.Point(10, 20)
print(pt:Unpack())
.....
10    20

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local hit = SWE.RandomHit(33)
    print(hit:ToJson())

    for i = 1,100 do
	local check = hit:Check()
    end

    local check = hit:Check()
    print(hit:ToJson())

    for i = 2,100 do
	local check = hit:Check()
    end

    local check = hit:Check()
    print(hit:ToJson())

    for i = 2,100 do
	local check = hit:Check()
    end

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content: | chance  | number  |

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local rt1 = SWE.Rect(10,20,100, 200)
local rt2 = SWE.Rect(50,80,100, 200)
local res = rt1:GetIntersectRect(rt2)
print("intersect rect",res.ToJson())

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local rt1 = SWE.Rect(10,20,100, 200)
local rt2 = SWE.Rect(50,80,100, 200)
local res = rt1:HasIntersection(rt2)
print("has intersection",res)

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local rt = SWE.Rect(10,20,100, 200)
local pt = SWE.Point(150, 150)
local res = rt:PointInRect(pt)
print("point in rect",res)

Return.description: true if the two rectangles are exactly the same

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local rt = SWE.Rect(10, 20, 100, 200)
print(rt:ToJson())
.....
'{"posx":10,"posy":20,"width":100,"height":200}'

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local landscape = false
    local win = SWE.DisplayInit("GestureTest", landscape)

    win.SystemUserEvent = function(a,b)
        if a == SWE.Signal.GestureFingerUp then
            SWE.Debug("GestureFingerUp")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.GestureFingerDown then
            SWE.Debug("GestureFingerDown")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.GestureFingerLeft then
            SWE.Debug("GestureFingerLeft")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.GestureFingerRight then
            SWE.Debug("GestureFingerRight")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.FingerMoveUp then
            SWE.Debug("FingerMoveUp")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.FingerMoveDown then
            SWE.Debug("FingerMoveDown")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.FingerMoveLeft then
            SWE.Debug("FingerMoveLeft")
	    return true
        elseif a == SWE.Signal.FingerMoveRight then
            SWE.Debug("FingerMoveRight")
	    return true
        end
	return false
    end

    SWE.MainLoop(win)

examples.title: usage

local image1 = SWE.Texture.Image("logo.png")
image1:RenderText(frs,SWE.Color.Red,"APPROVED",image1.width/2,image1.height/2,SWE.Align.Center,SWE.Align.Center)

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
local image1 = SWE.Texture.Image("logo.png")
local image2 = image.Texture(200,100)
-- copy texture area(50, 50, 50, 50) from image1 to texture image2 dst pos(100, 50)
image2:RenderTexture(image1,50,50,50,50,100,50)
print(image2.width,image2.height)

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
-- create window area(30,30,200,100) on display scene
local win2 = SWE.Window(30,30,200,100)

examples.title: ext table fields (read only)
examples.content:
| posx      | number  | window position
| posy      | number  | window position
| width     | number  | window size
| height    | number  | window size
| visible   | boolean | window is visible (defalut false)
| modality  | boolean | window is modality (defalut false)
| keyhangle | boolean | window is global key handle (defalut false)

type: window set global key handle mode
title: SWE.Window.SetKeyHandle
name: SetKeyHandle

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.DisplayResizeEvent = function(w,h)
	print("new win size",w,h)
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.KeyPressEvent = function(k)
	if k == SWE.Key.ESCAPE then
	    win:SetVisible(false)
	    print("hide window")
	end
	return true
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.KeyReleaseEvent = function(k)
	if k == SWE.Key.ESCAPE then
	    win:SetVisible(false)
	    print("hide window")
	end
	return true
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.MouseClickEvent = function(px,py,pbtn,rx,ry,rbtn)
	print(px,py,rx,ry)
	return true
    end

title: SWE.Window.MouseFocusEvent

Parameter.description: constantly increasing counter (SWE.MainLoop cycle), in milliseconds, from the starting

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.SystemTickEvent = function(tick)
	print("tick:",tick)
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.SystemUserEvent = function(code,data)
	print("code:",code,type(data))
    end

title: SWE.Window.TextureInvalidEvent
name: TextureInvalidEvent
description: after resizing the display or rotate (for mobile os), all textures (if used) must be reinitialized, because the internal SDL render is changed

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.tx1 = SWE.Texture.Text(frs, text, SWE.Color.Red)
    ...
    win.TextureInvalidEvent = function()
	win.tx1 = SWE.Texture.Text(frs, text, SWE.Color.Red)
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.WindowCloseEvent = function()
	print("win closed")
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.WindowCreateEvent = function()
	print("win created")
    end

examples.title: usage
examples.content:
win.RenderWindow = function()
	win:RenderClear(SWE.Color.Silver)
	win:RenderRect(SWE.Color.Blue,0,0,win.width,win.height)
	win:RenderText(frs,"Hello World!",SWE.Color.Red,win.width/2,win.height/2,SWE.Align.Center,SWE.Align.Center)
	return true
    end
